title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, the Team entry is missing from the context menu. It should be present to allow for synchronization.
OB: The Team entry is not available in the context menu when selecting a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
EB: The Team entry should be available in the context menu when selecting a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) simultaneously. 3. Right-click to open the context menu. 4. Observe that the Team entry is missing.
